QuestData.Title: Blood of Fallen Brothers
QuestData.Description: Orcs that drink Gul'dan's poison turn into fel beasts. Soulless savages.$b$bLady Liadrin an' the Blood Knights think maybe there be a way back. They be wantin' samples of blood from freshly turned orcs. Get their blood, $n!$b$bYou be findin' fel orcs all over Tanaan, but the Iron Front, the Fel Forge, and the Throne of Kil'jaeden is where you find the most.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $oa Vials of Fel Blood from fel orcs throughout Tanaan Jungle.
